entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING ENDED, Baddeck
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:51 AM ADT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Eskasoni (First Nations) 05:00 AM ADT Thursday 16 March 2023
Temperature: 0.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.3 kPa falling

Dewpoint: -0.5°C
Wind: NNE 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Flurries beginning this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
